name: Cosmic Booty
description:
Cosmic Booty is a sea battle tactics game! Destroy all the enemies.

Controls

  • W and S set your desired speed, the ship will begin to accelerate or decelerate to match
    • Check the bottom right for your actual speed vs desired
  • A and D set your desired heading, the ship will turn towards it
    • The arc around you ship shows your desired heading
  • Aim at enemy ships by turning your broadside to them, your crew will fire towards where they think the ship will be
    • The white arcs either side of your ship (and the enemies) show where the cannons can aim
  • Try to maximise damage to your enemies while keeping your ship safe by turning your broadside to their bow or stern.
